alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Fentress; Overton; Pickett; Putnam; Van Buren; White (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 9:25PM CDT until April 13 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Overton County in Middle Tennessee... Northeastern Pickett County in Middle Tennessee... Cumberland County in Middle Tennessee... Northeastern Van Buren County in Middle Tennessee... Southeastern White County in Middle Tennessee... Southeastern Putnam County in Middle Tennessee... Fentress County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 925 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mount Pisgah to 10 miles northeast of Spencer, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Crossville, Jamestown, Spencer, Fairfield Glade, Crab Orchard, Allardt, Pleasant Hill, Grimsley, Cumberland Mountain State Park, Slate Springs, Virgin Falls State Natural Area, Lake Tansi, Indian Rock Lake, Clarkrange, Pickett State Park and Fall Creek Falls State Park. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 305 and 340. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Cumberland; Fentress; Overton; Pickett; Putnam; Van Buren; White
